Package es.uniovi.reflection.weaver

Classes necessary to run the weaver.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Decorator
    Decorator interface to generate java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle objects referring to the woven method.
    Pointcut
    Interface used to encapsulate and manage pointcuts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultBootstrap
    Bootstrap class used to handle the invoke-dynamic calls.
    PointcutForObjects
    Pointcut implementation used when instance-level weaving is required.
    PointcutImpl
    Concrete class for the Pointcut interface implementation.
    PointcutManager
    Internal class to manage java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle and Pointcut objects to achieve compound (un)weaving. java.lang.invoke.MethodHandle objects referring to woven methods are binded to its pointcuts.
    StaticMethodDecorator
    An specific implementation of the Decorator interface.
    Weaver
    Static class to declare pointcuts in your code.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Time
    Enumeration describing the basic advice-types that can be combined with every joinpoint and weaving level.

Package es.uniovi.reflection.weaver Description

Classes necessary to run the weaver. It also provides the interface to create and manage pointcuts in your code.
Version:
1.1.0
Author:
Oscar Rodriguez-Prieto Date: 2017/07/11
